title: Hilliard Responds To Barra's Comments: Calls On GM To Resolve Pre-Bankruptcy Cases
content: CORPUS CHRISTI, Texas, Sept. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bob Hilliard, appointed by the Federal Judge in the GM MDL litigation to be the lead attorney for all personal injury and death cases caused by GM's defective ignition switch, responds to Mary Barra's statements regarding… CORPUS CHRISTI, Texas, Sept. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bob Hilliard, appointed by the Federal Judge in the GM MDL litigation to be the lead attorney for all personal injury and…
